entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Perhaps y'all should talk to actual doctors still in the administration and in hospitals that are currently overwhelmed with new #COVID19 patients. This administration choosing to align itself with #COVIDIOTS is a Choice with no science to back it up. #ActionsHaveConsequences
